name: The Little Ball That Really Could
name_original: The Little Ball That Really Could
description:
Control Scheme:

W- Forward

S-Backwards

A- Left

D-Right

Space - Jump(Can double jump on the air)

F- Used for the rage meter allowing you to phase through objects and when you turn black you revive yourself and continue without restarting the level.

P- Stops the boss in its tracks

T- To pause the game

Q- instant button to go to main menu

R- restarts the game(Press it only once)

Developer notes:

 This is still in development as i am planning to add in a boss fight at the end of the game.
